author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: حضرت موجود میفرماید: "خیمهٴ نظم عالم بدو ستون قائم و برپا مجازات و مکافات..."
translation: The Great Being saith: The structure of world stability and order hath been reared upon, and will continue to be sustained by, the twin pillars of reward and punishment.… In another passage He hath written: Take heed, O concourse
